import React from 'react' import { JournalEntries } from './JournalEntries' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { startLogout } from '../../actions/auth' import { startNewNote } from '../../actions/notes' export const Sidebar = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const handleLogout = () => { dispatch( startLogout() ) } const handleAddNew = () => { dispatch(startNewNote()) } const {name} = useSelector(state => state.auth) return (

{name}

New entry

) }
